chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going swimming?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?欢迎收听齐彬老师的超级英语通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to News English All Pass My name is Kenneth Chee欢迎收听新闻英语通 我是齐彬老师In this unit, we'll be learning about news English这个单元我们要来学习新闻英语So first, let's listen to today's news那么首先就让我们来听一下今天的新闻Exercise 实战演练
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: The benefits of daily meditationThe benefits of daily meditation
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: Many individuals report improved productivity and emotional resilienceApps and online resources make it easy for beginners to startWhether for relaxation or personal growthThe benefits are clearA calmer, happier you
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: Recent studies highlight meditation's role in improving mental health
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: Meditate 就是打坐的动词Mental health 最近很热门的话题就是心理健康Practicing mindfulness for just 10 minutes dailyreduces stress, enhances focus, and improves overall well-being
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: Mightfulness 是一个名词就是正向的意思Mightful 是一个形容词那么它的意思是流神或者是正念那每天专注正念就可以达成这里以下的好处Reduce stress 降低压力Enhance focus 强化专注力Enhance 是一个动词就是强化的意思
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: Overall 就是全面的而well-being 是一个名词讲的是整体的身心健康Experts suggest creating a peaceful environment for meditationand focusing on deep breathing专家就建议了要创造出一个平和的环境来打坐那么专注在深呼吸上
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 专家这么建议那么要注意的是suggest这个字后面要加上v-i-n-g所以专家建议这么做Creating a peaceful environment要有个平和的环境那么而且要专注在最后面deep breathing 就是深呼吸Many individuals report improved productivity and emotional resilience许多人都回报说生产力有增加
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 而且情绪的韧性也增强了Productivity 是一个名词指的是生产力用在个人身上指的就是效率Resilience 是一个名词指的就是韧性Apps and online resources make it easy for beginners to start现在有Apps 应用软体还有网络的资源让初学者很容易开始这里有个常用句型
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 这对学来说是很容易的他说无论是为了休闲还是个人成长这个好处是很明显的就是要有一个更冷静更开心的你这里有个句型无论或是什么
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: Relaxation 是一个名词就是放松的意思Personal growth指的就是个人的成长Benefit 在这边是一个名词意思就是益处好处那么以上就是本篇新闻的解说您可以回过头去多听几次增加对news的理解还顺便训练你的Listening
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 这个单元我们要来看的用法是suggest followed by v-i-n-g or gerund本身suggest是一个动词叫做建议或提议后面加了v-i-n-g这个动名词表示的是建议做这样的动作我们看一下新闻里的例句
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 那么这边专家建议的就是要创造一个安静的环境再看一个例句医生就建议休息几天医生suggest的是
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 休息几天所以要记好了下次遇到suggest后面要加上v-i-n-g
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 名词正念专注于当下reduce动词减少降低enhance动词提高增加增强resilience名词韧性适应力productivity名词生产力效率
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: focus名词动词焦点集中relaxation名词放松休息growth名词成长发展well-being名词健康幸福stress名词压力紧张
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: resource名词资源emotional形容词情感的情绪的benefit名词好处益处这个单元我们讲的是meditation打坐或者是冥想那么它的动词是meditate
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通The Benefits of Daily Meditation. 每日冥想的好處.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以您想说我喜欢打坐您可以说I like to meditate或是I like meditation有机会您也可以practice meditation练习打坐希望您都学会了OK that's all for this unit最后请记得每日十分钟让您变成英语通我是奇兵老师until then see you next time
